articles.title: Reply Messages to Foreign Party, State Leaders
articles.content:
Reply Messages to Foreign Party, State Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, sent messages to foreign heads of party and state in reply to their congratulatory messages on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages from the Lao president who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the president of Syria who is regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party and the chief of the Palestinian National Authority who is president of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
					
					 He in the messages expressed his conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and relevant countries which have a long history and tradition would steadily develop, wishing them successes in their work and the struggle of the people of the said countries.
